name: Crimson Craze
description:
Take control of a Vampire Slayer and beat up a bunch of undead (or thereabout) monsters!
Use their blood as your own and become even stronger by absorbing their essence after each battle.

Features:

One level, spanning different views.
A reasonably sized moveset and upgrades which change your moves.
A boss that will test your mettle.
Blood
...Lots of Blood.

Default Controls:

Z: Light Attack
X: Heavy Attack
C: Weapon Swap
V: Light Attack Button + Heavy Attack Button
Arrow Keys: Move
Spacebar: Jump / Choose Upgrade

Team:

FearJudge: Coding
Jozefynn Brillantes: 2D Art & Design
Taisto Saromäki: 3D Art & Design
